item.title: Former presidents honour Dick Cheney, while Trump, Vance snubbed for funeral invitation
item.description: <p>Political figures from across the aisle have gathered in Washington, DC, for former Vice President Dick Cheney&#x27;s funeral — sending off a key figure of pre-MAGA Republican politics.</p>

item.title: 'Putting them on notice': AFP issues stark warning after arrests over alleged threats to MPs
item.description: <p>&quot;These three incidents are an example of the challenges we face in combating those who are seeking to damage our social cohesion.&quot;</p>

item.title: Bail as P-plater 'singular error' allegedly kills pregnant woman in Sydney, court hears
item.description: <p>A childcare worker whose &quot;singular error&quot; allegedly caused a horrific crash, killing a pregnant woman and her unborn child, has been granted release on bail.</p>

item.title: Woman has crucial surgery cancelled three times as SA waitlist grows
item.description: <p>A Barossa Valley woman who&#x27;s had her elective surgery cancelled three times this year has made an emotional plea for help.</p>

item.title: South Australian schoolies festival gets under way
item.description: <p>Victor Harbor is currently hosting thousands of school leavers celebrating the end of their secondary education at the annual schoolies festival. </p>

item.title: Schoolies preparations under way on the Gold Coast
item.description: <p>Surfers Paradise is preparing for the influx of approximately 15,000 school leavers expected to arrive for Schoolies Week. </p>

item.title: US brand designer visits Brisbane after logo rebrand goes viral
item.description: <p>Caleb Nugent﻿, the co-founder of BrandFoundry Collective, unveiled a new city logo design based on the shape of the river that snakes through the city, conveniently in a loose &#x27;B&#x27; shape.</p>

item.title: Grief-stricken families disappointed by Wieambilla coronial findings
item.description: <p>In court, they shook their heads in disbelief at the unexpected outcome after a &quot;disturbing and disgusting&quot; inquest.</p>

item.title: Teacher 'unaware' her sexual abuse of students was harmful avoids $2m payout
item.description: <p>Helga Lam taught languages at a school in Sydney&#x27;s eastern suburbs in 1978 and 1979 when she allegedly sexually abused multiple students.</p>

item.title: Police make key breakthrough in case of murdered Adelaide dad
item.description: <p>Police are one step closer to solving a South Australian murder mystery after finding a car suspected to be connected to the brutal case.</p>

item.title: Minister warns cyclone is changing direction
item.description: T﻿ropical Cyclone Fina is expected to get stronger as it barrels towards parts of the Top End, including Da...
